website_summaries.verdict: A super-cool, customizable camera bag that holds lots of space and allows for excellent multi-use functionality. Well worth the money.
pros: A very versatile bag with something for everybody
Water resistant and highly secure, it's great for travel and will fit all of the bare photography essentials
cons: Plenty of features that may cater too much for a general crowd and not camera-specific enough

customer_reviews.title: Very Cool Looking - Well Made Camera Backpack
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use as a quick get away type of camera gear backpack. The bag is very well made. Lots of zippered pockets for storage .... the side pouches can also be used for water bottles .....I am able to get the following in mine In the bottom / back area 1-Professional size camera body (would also work with a battery gripped body) 1 - 12-24mm wide angle lens 1 - 24-105mm camera lens 1 Spare battery pack In the top area 1 - 100-400mm Canon lens
customer_reviews.author: Bob H.

customer_reviews.title: Great camera bag with lots of hidden features!
customer_reviews.text: I finally outgrew my small camera bag and it was time to upgrade to a backpack. I didn't want a huge backpack as I only shoot pictures leisurely. This backpack is the perfect size for me. The material is more denim-like than anything, so i was very happy about that. lenses are protected very well and there's enough space for your camera in the top compartment even if you have an attached zoom lens. The handles for the removable storage compartment were a bit cumbersome while in the backpack, but i just tucked them away. Overall a great camera backpack that hopefully lasts me a while.
customer_reviews.author: Rob L

customer_reviews.title: Seriously impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I don't have nearly as much equipment as some of the other reviewers. Just a Fuji XT-10, Flash, and a couple lenses (kit lens and a wide angle). It fits everything I have, with plenty of room to spare. The quality on this bag is fantastic, and everything is well thought out. The first thing I said when I opened the package was...wow...this is impressively good quality. Not something you expect from a no-name brand,
customer_reviews.author: Hsayy

customer_reviews.title: On point product with great design
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews on this bag before buying. And when it did come I couldn't be more satisfied. The bag is well built and with great quality material. It even comes with a rain shield even though the bag is water resistant. The design is with protection in mind, one cannot get to the camera unless the bag is taken off and open from the lower back opening. The top part of the bag is also roomy, and can hold lots of aux stuff such as cleaning supplies or an ipad. I could use it as my main travel bag as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ming Paul Wang

customer_reviews.title: Rugged, Plenty of Room, Protective, Multi-purpose Backpack for Cameras
customer_reviews.text: The mid-size backpack has a padded (inside & out), removable compartment that holds my Canon 35-70 mm, and 70-300 mm zoom, GoPro & selfie stick, and chargers. That's just the bottom half. The top half has a separate lined compartment with room for miscellaneous items. Laptop (12.25" x 8.25") fits easily in its padded compartment. Side pockets with hefty Velcro closures sure to keep your stuff in the bag, and a few other zippered pouches make this a great all around backpack for an amateur photog like me. Looking forward to the field test.
customer_reviews.author: wendymch

customer_reviews.title: Amazing camera backpack designer thought of everything
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is amazing!! I love how the camera & lenses are stored. Everything about this bag was well thought out. I was able to put my 15 inch MacBook in the laptop sleeve, all my camera accessories for a sports shoot, and the contents of my purse comfortably in this backpack. I was able to take three bags and put all their contexts into this backpack. Yes it was heavy with the laptop, but condensing my purse, laptop bag and camera bag for travel through an airport was amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: momRussell

customer_reviews.title: Solid bag for a medium amount of gear
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this bag a 4.5 I would, it's a well put together bag, it's not the most comfortable bag, but it's not bad either, the layout is fantastic for a camera and a few lenses and a few accessories. The pouches and zippers are all well put together. The title is a little misleading, the bag is not waterproof, the cover that's included is mostly waterproof. The cover is not very sturdy and will come off in windy conditions, but it works otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C.

customer_reviews.title: Holds all my camera gear plus some personal items.
customer_reviews.text: Received the bag a few days ago and just moved all my camera gear into it. Everything fit along with a 10" tablet my over ear headphones, and my travel gear with room to spare. This will be great on trips. It has a rain hood but isn't waterproof without it, would be nice if it was. The removable camera bag does appear rain proof though. It seems well constructed and on my first and only outing so far it was comfortable to carry on my back. The construction seems to be top notch and I'm expecting this to last years. Very pleased I chose this bag and will recommend it to friends.
customer_reviews.author: MAM

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag!
customer_reviews.text: I mainly use a Nikon D750 that I hike a lot with. So, along with an extra lens, back up batteries, a charger and SD cards I also carry water, a first aid kit and whatever else I might need for that days hike. It all fits perfectly. I also noticed that even though the bag feels heavy once loaded down, by the time I’ve put it on and strapped up it’s weight is perfectly distributed and I almost forget I’m carrying it. The material is super durable and and water resistant to an extent. This has turned out to be the perfect bag for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: I love absolutely everything about this book bag the storage is fantastic, the water proofing, removable belt buckle hidden tripod pocket and removable camera bucket/bay. The only thing I need is somewhere to put my yeti. The side pockets are too slim to put a yeti outside of the bag and I’m scared to put my cup inside the bag because it will spill. But I can honestly overlook that because the bag is so fantastic, it feels expensive and like it’s great quality, the customer care is fantastic! Super awesome bag 10/10 I’d recommend it and have recommended to a lot of my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Maidment

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic bag (looks and feels great)
customer_reviews.text: Really quite like this particular bag. It was quite sturdy and very sharp looking. Everything fit well. My only (minor) complaint was the slightly snug fit of the two small side pouches/pockets (where one might stash a water bottle or 2 on the outside.) It would have been better if there was a tad more room or flexibility in these two pockets, making it easier to fit in a Nalgeen water bottle or similar sized container. Otherwise, I quite liked this bag. The camera insert workd very nicely and it was overall quite comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEST COMPACT CAMERA BACKPACK
customer_reviews.text: This camera backpack comes with everything you need compartment, security connivance, portability and more.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Palay

customer_reviews.text: The overall quality of this bag seems to be pretty good, we have brought it full of camers gear on 2 trips in the past 3mo. We have: the camera, 2 batteries, 3 lenses, filters, my laptop, lense cleaners,a few more odd and end pieces, and the tripod with room for a few more things in there for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, but a tad smaller than I assumed
customer_reviews.text: It is a bit smaller than what I assumed, but it is still a great bag. I fit all three of my cameras in it, as well as four lenses. I put my most used gear in it. And I have an old bag for all my extras. It really allows for me to take what I will need for what I will be capturing. Great bag.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron G. Randall

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to carry my camera gear with me on trips. I took it to India with me and it worked really well. I love the layout, all the compartments and the quality. I even use it as a regular backpack to carry my laptop. I took out the camera insert bag when I'm not actually using it to carry my lens and use the lower compartment to carry my sweater. Love that I don't have to dig deep inside the bag to find my stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Need something less National Geographic looking!
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to love this. A fellow professional photographer recommended this bag and it is a nice bag but couldn’t get over the green color. I’m a professional wedding photographer with a lot of gear to haul around. Thought this was the one for me but had to return. Almost kept to use as a travel bag. This would be perfect for that! I’m a professional wedding photographer and need something a bit more fancy. Still looking for that perfect camera backpack that doesn’t make me look like I’m heading out on a safari.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Elisabeth Photography

customer_reviews.title: Not one thing or the other
customer_reviews.text: This bag is designed to offer too much. It is not designed specifically for camera storage - nor is it designed especially for clothing and accessories. Herein lies the problem. You must work through needless clutter to access lens and camera body. The camera storage dept. is incased in a nylon bag with handles. Some might find this helpful. For me, it was more annoying to access the compartment. After removing the camera section, it posed more trouble getting the compartment back into the bag. The bag looks nice and is well manufactured, but the camera angle is more of an afterthought in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Held

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for an overseas trip- worked great!
customer_reviews.text: This bag was perfect for our overseas trip! the backpack style made it easy to carry though airports. And the many pockets were great for taking everything I needed for travel in addition to my camera. Loved the fact that the camera access was on the back, not easily accessible for thieves. I spilled a drink on it and the liquid just rolled off :D And the padding is great- I managed to get two very thin wine glasses home safely through 4 airports/airplanes over the course of 28 hours! I would definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Great travel bag that fits camera/lenses/Mavic Air.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag for a trip to Ireland where I wanted to easily haul my dslr camera, a couple lenses, all of my gear for my Mavic Air, and iPad. This bag fit all this gear plus room for even more! Seems to be of really durable construction although I didn’t test the waterproof-ness. Plus, it looks really stylish, so that’s always a bonus. It also has the secret pocket for your tripod which is a cool feature. All in all, I’d definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this product. Amazon identified it as the best and I think they were right. I’m going to be using it for three weeks on assignment in Norway and based on my experience so far I’m confident I found the right product for the work I’m going to be doing.
customer_reviews.author: C. Harvey Smith

customer_reviews.title: Lots of pockets I didn't realize it had.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't traveled with this backpack yet. It seems very sturdy and is waterproof. I poured water on it and it just beaded right off. Afterwards the material didn't feel wet to the touch. It appears to have good protection for the camera. I tried it on and the straps were very comfortable. I am happy with this purchase. There are many more pockets than I thought too and the velcro is very strong.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: The quality was good. Nice looking bag. Comfortable. I didn't like that you had to take the bag off to access the main padded compartment. Even when you did take it off I felt like it was a little more cumbersome to access the pocket than I wanted. We ultimately got another bag.
customer_reviews.author: trs80

customer_reviews.title: This camera backpack works well
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t had it in rain yet to test, but I do like the size, rugged canvas construction, and padding. It has heavy plastic inner bags for added rain protection. It stores my dsl with the 28-300 mm zoom attached for quick retrieval. I can’t wait to try on our Mexico trip this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin H

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Bag
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and easy to organize camera gear. and when not needing for camera easily remove camera option and nice day bag.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Probably my best backpack so far
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be more happy with my buy! This backpack easily fits all my gear and more. I love how it keeps it's form with or without any gear in it. So many useful and practical ways to carry your tripod, camera, laptop, whatever you want! And then, when you simply need a regular backpack, you just convert it with one single move. I like the design and the color a lot too. All in all, great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack
customer_reviews.text: This is a great back-pack. The material is strong and water-resistant. It also serves its function well (the camera is very secure), although there is not a lot of extra space in the top compartment, especially if you travel. This is the only reason I give it one less star.
customer_reviews.author: TAL South Africa

customer_reviews.title: Nice backpack very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I like this backpack it’s comfortable and looks good just to bad it doesn’t that big as the picture shows it but still a good backpack for some one without more then a camera and a laptop/tablet
customer_reviews.author: Netanel Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable to carry and has more than enough pockets for all of my equipment and snacks for hikes. I would buy this product again! Only gripe is the Velcro that holds the top flap down. Would prefer buttons, still great product nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: Don W.

customer_reviews.title: Prefect camera backpack
customer_reviews.text: We used this in Africa I really liked it - I carried two cameras in it Has plenty of pockets - 2x outside water bottle compartments - They are defiantly handy for Africa ! The remaining compartment for non camera stuff might seem a bit small initially - but in the end I never had a problem carrying what I needed
customer_reviews.author: JORGE

customer_reviews.title: Good spacious backpack
customer_reviews.text: Overall great and good looking backpack! I like how the camera compartment insert can be removed, so I use it on days even when I don't have my camera with me. Besides the main compartment, there's tons of other pockets on the backpack so there's never a shortage of space. It also seems pretty waterproof since it rains a ton where I'm from and the stuff inside always stays dry.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made, too small to hold anything
customer_reviews.text: The zippers on this backpack are very cheap. I would not rely on it to hold my expensive camera equipment. The laptop pouch barely fits my 13” MacBook Pro. The top portion of the backpack can’t hold much, maybe 2 or 3 t-shirts.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew C.

customer_reviews.title: Zippers look cheap and were sticking
customer_reviews.text: Thee teeth on the zippers would stay stuck together on the ends after unzipping and the zippers felt cheaply made. The canvas material is also not as thick as I expected but the zipper problem is what prompted me to return the bag.
customer_reviews.author: JML

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size, well built. Fits my canon 6d plus 6 lenses in the bottom section. In the top, a 500mm t mount lens, plus various filters and gadgets with room to spare. Straps on the bottom for a large tripod, and straps on either side where I've strapped a 1600mm t mount lens on one side and water bottle on the other.
customer_reviews.author: uchral

customer_reviews.title: Well Made!
customer_reviews.text: Durable and sturdy, I have my DSLR in the rear back section and it fits perfectly. The backpack is well made and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Jag151

customer_reviews.title: Great traveler!
customer_reviews.text: Great look, lots of compartments, camera section adaptable to other things (sometimes for a flight, I make it my pharmacy), and very secure! I am very pleased and have recommended the backpack to others. It's just my style! The waterproof cover is a great idea!
customer_reviews.author: baba

customer_reviews.title: Love this backpack!
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack! It looks great, feels super durable, has plenty of storage and the weight is evenly distributed. I usually have a camera base, two lenses, a couple batteries and a charger, a water bottle, and external flash (with extra batteries, some) and some small reflectors. There is still plenty of extra room for more accessories, a laptop, documents, a tripod, and another lens.
customer_reviews.author: Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: This back is amazing. I would recommend. Its also comfortable to wear long periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Turner

customer_reviews.title: More than I expected.  Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: I think my back pack looks very nice. I would use this as a travel bag. The quality is a cut above others I looked at. I have nothing negative to say. I am pleased about my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: charlie mike

customer_reviews.title: Will it work as carry on on the airlines overseas
customer_reviews.text: I m giving this a 4 as I have not used it on a trip yet. I bought it because when I went to Europe this fall I so wished I had a back pack that would hold my camera and my purse and my passport etc as the carryon because of the airline restrictions. I am pretty sure it will work.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne P Walenga

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect bag for travel. Opens from the back so the camera is safe. Repels water.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew S.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic bag
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for exactly what this bag offers. It's more than just a camera backpack. So many pockets, excellent quality, and seems like it will hold up well for quite a long time. No regrets making this purchase, glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Shane  Brock

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: very nice quality. not a big bag but fits one camera and a few lenses fine.
customer_reviews.author: nickfisher3339

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: The bag is well made. Feels like my camera is very safe. The reason I give it a 4 Star it’s the area to store the camera is a bit hard to get to.
customer_reviews.author: No way Jose

customer_reviews.title: Excellent backpack with outstanding quality
customer_reviews.text: Just what we wanted for our new 850 and lenses
customer_reviews.author: Christy Burford

customer_reviews.title: Heavy
customer_reviews.text: Great gear bag, but it is SUPER heavy on my shoulders while shooting a wedding I can’t have it on me at all times.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: My favorite backpack!
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is great and super stylish! I'm totally in love with it and travel with it everywhere! Fits my MacBook Pro, Canon T6i, and three lenses perfectly with room to spare! Thinking of buying one for my girlfriend, too!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Krantzler

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT!! Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE my camera bag!! It's very sturdy & spacious! Not to mention it's a really nice backpack. I wore it on a rainy day & used the cover it comes with & it helped a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Mamitajay

customer_reviews.title: Nice Camera Bag
customer_reviews.text: I have used the bag more often now and I am really enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: Diane & Dave Kellogg

customer_reviews.title: MUST. HAVE.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely a MUST HAVE. Holds all of my gear with room to spare! I have a 2 full frame camera bodies, 4 lenses, a flash, extra batteries, 2 card holders, and extra cords/wires for equipment! It’s comfortable, durable, well made, and PERFECT.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Great camera bag
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived pretty fast upon ordering. Loved the quality and look of the bag. I was able to fit multiple lens along with my camera. The tripod goes at the bottom and provided the flexibility to carry. Great bag overall.
customer_reviews.author: uday devineni

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this purchase. After debating for a month between a few different bags, I chose this one for its functionality and style. Quality seems to be real good and the design was exactly what I needed in a around town bag.
customer_reviews.author: Dade

customer_reviews.title: Overall Nice
customer_reviews.text: The pack overall is nice, what I was looking for. However, it is smaller than anticipated. There is only one way to access the camera storage area and that’s from behind. Not the front...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: Almost no complaints! Very comfortable, easy to use, lotsbof storage, but the velcro wears down pretty quickly.
customer_reviews.author: PJ Manning

customer_reviews.title: Very very nice
customer_reviews.text: Perfect bag for a wedding/event photographer. The quality and stitching exceeded every expectation. Such a deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Russell

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: This bag was just what I was looking for, a backpack that does not look like a camera bag and can also be used for other purposes. The color and the material are of a very good quality with alot of pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Qais Alkindi

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and secure
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! I am so glad I bought this backpack. Holds my camera and the extra lenses securely.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Harris

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what I wanted. No too big or too small, enough for my laptop, camera, a few lenses and some accesories along with a tripod. It looks really pretty too.
customer_reviews.author: Belen Spera

customer_reviews.title: Lots of room!!
customer_reviews.text: I havent taken out my bag yet but first impression is it seems to be very well made! My camera and 3 lenses fit perfectly. I love all the extra room so I wont have to carry my camera bag and a purse. It is great it comes with a waterproof cover, well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: lesliefusco

customer_reviews.title: Great traveling bag.
customer_reviews.text: Love the bag. Used on a recent trip and got in my Nikon d3400 and zoom lens and my portrait lens. Love all the pockets for other items too
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Husted

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Holds everything we need, durable, good price and good bag
customer_reviews.author: Doug johnston

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, but limited on what you can securely carry.
customer_reviews.text: Quality bag, and looks fantastic. Just limited on what you can carry given the secure compartments for gear on the bottom area of bag, intended for camera/lens etc.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING PHOTOGRAPHY BAG
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is perfect. It doesn't look like it is a camera bag so it keeps away thieves (Stylish). Tons of pockets and a bunch of hidden ones for storing valuables. Big enough to hold all of my gear yet still compact.
customer_reviews.author: JTru Photography

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this backpack for my son for his birthday. He can fit his camera and gear in this backpack and everything is organized.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: I love it!!! The size is perfect! I’m so excited!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Vergel

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for carrying my camera and equipment and a jacket.
customer_reviews.text: Good for a short day hike if you don't have a lot to bring. The weather was good so I can't speak to it being water resistant.
customer_reviews.author: Xman

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy!
customer_reviews.text: Fits my gear perfectly and I love the way it looks!
customer_reviews.author: Kayde

customer_reviews.title: shipped on time and great bag
customer_reviews.text: very durable bag, a bit smaller than I thought but overall great product....
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Reliable
customer_reviews.text: Very great bag. Great space and very protective. I can tell it’ll last me awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Geweke

customer_reviews.title: Five stars!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, versatile, very good quality. Mostly I like that it does not look like a photographer's backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Hernández Méndez

customer_reviews.title: Durable, spacious.
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag! So much space for my equipment, tripod and hiking supplies.
customer_reviews.author: VRussell

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is a good size to be able to take a few other things with you, yet it is not cumbersome.
customer_reviews.author: FromCentralAmerica

customer_reviews.title: Greater than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is simply amazing. It looks nice and has a great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Alberto Holguin Moran

customer_reviews.title: The quality is very good. The bag is very practical the service is great.!
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag for the price plenty of room very practical!
customer_reviews.author: Julio A Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: I really love this back pack
customer_reviews.text: I really love this back pack. I really wanted a backpack with a laptop sleeve and it has it!!! Love ittt!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alba Chim

customer_reviews.title: Holds all my camera items
customer_reviews.text: The backpack is large enough to hold my camera and several lens.
customer_reviews.author: Eric C.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Travel
customer_reviews.text: This backpack has been working well for my camera gear, laptop and other essentials on recent trips!
customer_reviews.author: LLauren

customer_reviews.title: Good very travel
customer_reviews.text: Very good bag. I recently went out of country and it was perfect for protecting my passport and wallet when I went out. Also my camera fits well it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. Hold my 15 inch MacBook Pro and my Canon DSLR
customer_reviews.author: Teddy Sczudlo

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy material
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag. Sturdy, looks good, lightweight, keeps my kit dry and safe.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan L Grindstaff

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality backpack for the price holds my camera and lenses snuggly and keep the protected even on long hikes.
customer_reviews.author: Sean D

customer_reviews.title: Great service! Very nice bag!!
customer_reviews.text: This was just what I needed to organize my camera and equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 👌🏽
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I mean it’s not like a Filson waxed canvas quality, but it’s perfect for a camera bag.
customer_reviews.author: Ryzink

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack!
customer_reviews.text: It has so many versatile compartments, it’s perfect for hiking and traveling!
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn

customer_reviews.title: Great value bag.
customer_reviews.text: Lots of room for everything and very easy to fly with.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Parks

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: All the space that you need for a nice walk and shoot day.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Morales

customer_reviews.title: Zecti Camera Backpack
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it! Great quality, can't wait to take it out!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Bag
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of hold space and pockets to keep your lenses nice and safe. Nice bag.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of space for camera and so much more!
customer_reviews.text: I could not believe how amazing this pack is. I always have more than my camera to carry and I normally leave the camera home just so I don’t have to carry multiple bags. Well....no more!!! Since I purchased this pack, I have been able to enjoy my camera so much more cause I don’t have to decide what is more important, now I can pack it al with me. I have all my camera equipment with plenty of space to spare and all kinds of pockets and space for everything else. I love the material and the overall make of the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Storm

product_meta.title: Zecti Camera Backpack, Waterproof Canvas DSLR Camera Bag for Laptop Hiking Travel Compatible for Sony Canon Nikon Camera and Lens Tripod Accessories with Rain Cover Fathers' Gift-Green
feature_bullets: Removable pad divider in the camera bag provide flexible and large capacity for all your necessities for outdoor photography ( 1XDSLR, 4xlens, Laptop<14 inch, daily trivals, and etc.)
It is flexible to convert the dslr bag into leisure travel bag by just taking out the liner box to storing your various daily objects such as clothes, cellphones, snacks and other daily necessities
With the high-density waterproof canvas rucksack which comes with a rain cover, you will never worry about rains , damages, dust and scratches on your photography equipment.

Two separate compartment of the bag are designed for holding your different photography equipment: bottom space for your camera and lens. The top liner box for various accessories such as filters, batteries, charger, memory cards, cables, flashes and etc.
